thread.title: Coriant Strengthens North America Sales Leadership with Appointment of Sandra Krief as Managing Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Coriant Strengthens North America Sales Leadership with Appointment of Sandra Krief as Managing Director

organizations.name: coriant strengthens north america sales leadership

text:
NAPERVILLE, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Coriant , a global supplier of open, disruptive, and hyperscale networking solutions for service providers and web-scale Internet operators, today announced the appointment of Sandra Krief to Managing Director for North America. In this position, she will be responsible for sales operations, business development, channel strategy, and customer support throughout the U.S. and Canada. Based in New York City, Krief will report directly to the company’s Chief Customer Officer and EVP of Global Sales and Digital Marketing, Homayoun Razavi.
“With an outstanding track record of success in our industry, we’re very excited to welcome Sandra to the Coriant leadership team. As an accomplished sales executive, she will play a critical role in growing our strategic accounts, helping to drive new opportunities for our industry-leading portfolio of open and software-driven solutions, while building traction for our newly introduced multi-sided platform partner program,” said Razavi. “Sandra has demonstrated success in building high-performing and multi-functional sales, engineering and management teams, and coupled with her client successes she will enable us to further enhance the value we can bring to our North America customers.”
As an accomplished industry veteran with more than 20 years of experience in service provider and enterprise sales, Krief brings to Coriant strong technical, sales and leadership skills coupled with proven financial acumen. Previously, Krief served as Global VP at BroadSoft, a Cisco company, where she oversaw the company’s largest global customers including Verizon, AT&T and Sprint. There, she generated record sales while bringing a customer-centric vision to strategic product launches with BroadSoft’s largest customers. Her success resulted in one of the company’s largest SaaS revenues – and in 2016, she earned the company’s CEO Spotlight Award for her outstanding sales performance.
“North America represents one of Coriant’s largest regions in terms of growth opportunity as service providers, web-scale operators, enterprises, and cable/MSOs brace for the impact of 5G, IoT, edge compute, and other service-enabling technologies,” noted Krief. “With a proven solutions portfolio and disruptive innovations from its multi-sided platform ecosystem partners, Coriant is uniquely positioned to help customers realize the true revenue potential of new end-user services.”
About Coriant
Coriant delivers innovative and dynamic networking solutions for a fast-changing and cloud-centric business world. The Coriant SDN/NFV-enabled portfolio of open, disruptive, and hyperscale solutions and Multi-Sided Platform innovations helps network operators cost-efficiently scale network capacity, reduce operational complexity, and create the resilient foundation for a new generation of mobile, video, and cloud services. Coriant serves leading network operators around the world, including mobile and fixed line service providers, cloud and data center operators, Web 2.0 content providers, cable MSOs, government agencies, and large enterprises. With a distinguished heritage of technology innovation and service excellence, Coriant is helping its global customers maximize the service value of their network infrastructure as demand for bandwidth explodes and the communications needs of businesses and consumers continue to evolve.
